ruODK 0.6.5

Reference

OData API

attachment_get()

Download attachments and return the local path.

attachment_url()

Build the download URL for one or many submission UUIDs and filenames.

get_one_attachment()

Download one media attachment.

odata_metadata_get()

Retrieve metadata from an OData URL ending in .svc as list of lists

odata_service_get()

Retrieve service metadata from an OData URL ending in .svc as list of lists

odata_submission_get()

Retrieve /Submissions from an OData URL ending in .svc as list of lists

odata_submission_parse()

Parse the output of `odata_submission_get` into a tidy tibble and unnest all levels.

unnest_all()

Recursively unnest_wide all list columns in a tibble.

RESTful API

attachment_link()

Prefix attachment columns from CSV export with a local attachment file path.

attachment_list()

List all submissions of one form.

audit_get()

Get server audit log entries.

form_detail()

Show details for one form.

form_list()

List all forms.

form_schema()

Show the schema of one form.

form_schema_parse()

Parse a form_schema into a tibble of fields with name, type, and path.

form_xml()

Show the XML representation of one form as list.

project_create()

Create a new project.

project_detail()

List all details of one project.

project_list()

List all projects.

submission_detail()

Show metadata for one submission.

submission_export()

Export all form submissions including repeats and attachments to CSV.

submission_get()

Download one submission.

submission_list()

List all submissions of one form.

Utilities

isodt_to_local()

#' Check whether we have internet #' #' @importFrom httr GET #' @importFrom rlang warn #' @noRd has_internet <- function() online <- !is.null(httr::GET("google.com")) if (online == FALSE) rlang::warn("Please check internet connectivity!") invisible(online) Parse an ISO8601 datetime string to a timezone aware datetime.

map_chr_hack()

Map given function, handle null as NA and flatten_chr().

map_dttm_hack()

Map given function, handle null as NA, flatten_chr() and convert to dttm.

map_int_hack()

Map given function, handle null as NA and flatten_int().

map_lgl_hack()

Map given function, handle null as FALSE, flatten_chr() and convert to logical.

parse_datetime()

Parse all columns containing a certain word in its name to localised datetime.

prepend_uuid()

Prepend a leading "uuid:" to any string, e.g. an md5 hash.

strip_uuid()

Strip the leading "uuid:" from a UUID hash.

Settings

odata_svc_parse()

Retrieve URL, project ID, and form ID from an ODK Central OData service URL.

ru_settings() get_default_pid() get_default_fid() get_default_url() get_default_un() get_default_pw() get_test_url() get_test_un() get_test_pw() get_test_pid() get_test_fid() get_test_fid_zip() get_test_fid_att()

Get or set ruODK settings.

ru_setup()

Configure default ruODK settings.

yell_if_error()

Warn about failed web requests and give helpful troubleshooting tips.

yell_if_missing()

Abort on missing ODK Central credentials (url, username, password).

Example data

fq_meta

OData metadata document for an ODK Central form.

fq_raw

OData submission data for an ODK Central form.

fq_raw_strata

OData submission data for a subgroup of an ODK Central form.

fq_raw_taxa

OData submission data for a subgroup of an ODK Central form.

fq_svc

OData service document for an ODK Central form.
